title: Bindi Irwin posts a sweet message for fiancé Chandler Powell
text:
Bindi Irwin announced her engagement on her 21st birthday in July, after her boyfriend-of-six-years Chandler Powell, 22, popped the question.

And the wildlife warrior took to Instagram on Sunday to share a sweet message for her fiancé.

The 21-year-old posted a photo of the couple in an embrace, and captioned the shot: 'I love, you forever.'

'I love you, forever': Bindi Irwin, 21, posted a sweet message for fiancé Chandler Powell, 22, to Instagram on Sunday, after revealing the couple will tie the knot next year at Australia Zoo

In the snap, Bindi wore a navy jacket and dark blue jeans, and placed on her left hand on Chandler's chest.

The American wakeboarder sported a blue long-sleeved top and jeans, and wrapped one arm around his love.

Fans of the couple flocked to the comments, describing the pair as 'so cute' and 'gorgeous'.

Put it in your diaries! In early September, Bindi confirmed via Instagram that she and Chandler will marry next year

In early September, Bindi revealed via Instagram that she and Chandler will marry next year.

The duo will tie the knot in front of family and friends in 2020 in a ceremony that will be hosted at Australia Zoo.

Taking to social media, Bindi shared a sweet snap of herself and husband-to-be Chandler cuddling up to each other, as he cradled a koala in his arms.

All coming together: The wildlife warrior and Chandler will tie the knot in front of family and friends in 2020 in a ceremony that will be hosted at Australia Zoo

The loved-up pair look completely smitten in the photo and Bindi revealed alongside it that plans for their wedding are now well underway.

'Wedding planning is in full swing for us and it has been an amazing whirlwind.

'We're looking forward to celebrating our wedding day next year at Australia Zoo. Of course, the day will be filled with family, friends and lots of gorgeous animals [koala cuddles are a must!]'

Bindi then asked her followers for advice when it comes to organising her nuptials, while Chandler gushed that he 'can't wait to marry' Bindi in a similar post he shared to Instagram.
description: Bindi Irwin, 21, shared a sweet message for fiancé Chandler Powell, 22, to Instagram on Sunday.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
